org.ftccommunity.org.ftccommunity.ftcxtensible.interfaces

Interface OpModeLoop

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FullOpMode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArcadeDriveTeleop, AutoMode, BasicLayout, CameraOpMode, ExtensibleLinearOpMode, ExtensibleOpMode, GamepadRecording, HelloWorld, K9TankDrive, LinearAutoModeAdapter, NetworkOpMode, ReadWriteExtensibleOpMode, SimpleDemo, SimpleOpMode, StandardOpMode, xNetworkAnalyzer

    public interface OpModeLoop
    The looping segment of an OpMode, this gets called for a standard loop cycle by the Xtensible components if the loop cycle needs to execute a different segment of code
    Since:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    David Sargent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loop(RobotContext ctx, java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Object> out)
      An implementation of an Xtensible loop cycle, this is the loop to use for standard use cases where the Xtensible library is involved

    • Method Detail

      • loop

        void loop(RobotContext ctx,
          java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Object> out)
   throws java.lang.Exception
        An implementation of an Xtensible loop cycle, this is the loop to use for standard use cases where the Xtensible library is involved
        Parameters:
        ctx - Robot Context
        out - Means to push your results out of this method, and hands off processing of this objects to the onSuccess method of the full OpMode
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
